titleStmt.title: A lamentable ballad of a combate lately performed neer [sic] London, between Sir James Steward, and Sir George Wharton knights: who were both slain at that time. Tune is, Down Plumpton Park, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, and J. Wright.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Right half-sheet contains: The second part, to the same tune.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
